definitions.definition: An Asian vine (several species in the genus Pueraria , but mostly Pueraria montana var. lobata , syn. Pueraria lobata in the US), grown as a root starch, and which is a notorious invasive weed in the United States.
A starch extracted from the root that is used in traditional East Asian medicine and cuisine.

main_definition: An Asian vine (several species in the genus Pueraria , but mostly Pueraria montana var. lobata , syn. Pueraria lobata in the US), grown as a root starch, and which is a notorious invasive weed in the United States.
secondary_definitions: ( cooking , medicine ) A starch extracted from the root that is used in traditional East Asian medicine and cuisine.
